Audio Description: At the center of this poster is a color photograph of a brunette, blue-eyed woman in a dark green Army Nurse Corps uniform and cap, with a tan shirt and tie. On the front of her cap is a gold insignia of an eagle holding an olive branch in its right talon and a bundle of arrows in its left. The eagle has a ribbon in its beak and is balancing the Great Seal of the United States above its head. Her uniform has brass bars and buttons on the shoulders, and a brass button on her right pocket. Above her left pocket is a ribbon bar. On each lapel are brass letters that  “U.S.” and a caduceus (medical insignia). Above the photograph, on a white background in gray letters, are the words “You are needed now”. Below the photograph, on a white background in dark red letters, are the words “join the Army Nurse Corps, Apply at your Red Cross recruiting station.”
Creator: American National Red Cross; United States. Army Nurse Corps
Description: Poster, 78 x 52 cm, artist: Ruzzie Green
